Fleet.name: Fleet
Fleet.description: Represents a group of assets used in commercial, service, or transport operations in the manufacturing industry.

ActiveAssetCount.description: The total number of assets associated with a fleet record. This field shows a rolled-up value based on the number of Fleet Asset records in Active status associated with a Fleet record.

CurrentOwnerId.description: The current owner of the fleet.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date until when a fleet is operational.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when a fleet is operational.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The ID of the location that the fleet is associated with.

Name.description: The name of a fleet record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user or user group who owns this record.

ParentFleetId.description: The parent fleet that a fleet record is part of in a hierarchy.

Status.description: Specifies the status of a fleet record.

Type.description: The type of a fleet record.
